verses.text: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* feedeth \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* wind, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* followeth \w the|strong="H5437"\w* burning heat: \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* day \w long|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* multiplied \w lies|strong="H3585"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* desolation: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* hath \w made|strong="H5437"\w* \w a|strong="H5750"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w carried|strong="H0539"\w* oil \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Egypt.

Therefore \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* judgment \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* visitation \w for|strong="H4714"\w* Jacob: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* render \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* according \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ways, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* according \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* devices.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb \w he|strong="H3068"\w* supplanted \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* success \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w an|strong="H7725"\w* angel.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* prevailed \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* angel, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* strengthened: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* wept, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* made supplication \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* found \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Bethel, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* there \w he|strong="H0430"\w* spoke \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H0853"\w*.

Even \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* memorial.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* turn thou \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: keep \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hope \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* always.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* Chanaan, \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* deceitful balance \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* hand, \w he|strong="H0430"\w* hath loved oppression.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Ephraim said: But yet \w I|strong="H3027"\w* am become rich, \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* found \w me|strong="H4820"\w* an idol: all \w my|strong="H3027"\w* labours \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* not find \w me|strong="H4820"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* iniquity \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* committed.

\w And|strong="H0669"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* am \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt, \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* cause thee \w to|strong="H0559"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H4672"\w* tabernacles, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* feast.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* spoken \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* multiplied visions, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* used similitudes \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ministry \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets.

If Galaad \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* idol, \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* vain \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Galgal offering sacrifices \w with|strong="H5921"\w* bullocks: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars also \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3027"\w* heaps \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furrows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field.

Jacob fled \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Syria, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* Israel \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* keeper \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wife.

\w But|strong="H3290"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* Lord \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3290"\w* prophet brought \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Egypt: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3290"\w* prophet.

Ephraim hath provoked \w me|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* bitterness, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* blood \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* upon \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* render \w his|strong="H8104"\w* reproach unto \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.
